title: Flag of China
summary: The flag of China, officially the National Flag of the People's Republic of China, also known as the Five-star Red Flag,[2] is a Chinese red field with five golden stars charged at the canton. The design features one large star, with four smaller stars in an arc set off towards the fly. It has been the national flag of China since the foundation of the People's Republic of China on 1 October 1949.
